choices: Go to the Empire Hotel
Go to the Park
Go to the Orchard
1.content:
cerial




Jenny runs her hands across the end of a lighter as her hands grow cold. The winter wind enters the tunnel under the street and blows on Jenny's exposed face. Jenny brings her head up from her backpack and smiles at the sight of a bunny scurrying around.
"Hello James" Jenny quickly finds a name for her new friend before the bunny escapes into the darkness under a stump.
Jenny's joints ache as she finds herself rising from the blankets and to her feet.
"eeeerrrrrr" Jenny runs her empty stomach before throwing her duffel bag across her back.
The bike squeaks and clicks as it wobbles down the street. The seat was ripped and the back tire was bent. But, Jenny loved the bike .
The bike that Jenny found alongside the rail road tracks now hurdles into motion as Jenny heads down the street. Jenny was 3 miles from the nearest town and her legs ached as she rose and fell with the hills of the road.
"One last one" Jenny thought as she started up the last hill before the downward slope into town. Jenny's legs burn as the road grabs at the tires. The wind blows against Jenny's face and her back pack although empty seems to gain weight. Jenny stands on the pedals as her thin figure starts to sway back and forth working the bike to the top of the hill.
Stopping at the crest of the hill Jenny looks down and says aloud "Now where to?"
Jenny could go to the Empire hotel. They always had great food, out back that is. She could go to the park. People were always leaving food laying around there and it was the nearest spot. And then there is the orchard. It has been a while since she has been to the orchard Jenny could load up her backpack without anyone noticing or criticizing her. But, it was also on the other side of town and would take most of the afternoon to get to.
1.title: Home Sweet Home

choices: Enough Sight Seeing
11.content: It was Saturday. The Empire always hosted huge events on Friday night and would defentially have some very good things out back. The hotel seemed like the best way to go. Perhaps she could even find some things to keep her warm.
11.title: The Empire Hotel

choices: Jenny is able to turn
"Hello bushes."
111.content: With a small grunt Jenny started down the hill. Jenny felt the wind blow her hair back as the tires zipped down the hill. There was a small curve coming and Jenny pulls on the brake handle. Much to her surprise nothing. Nothing at all. The bike continued to pick up speed as the curve fast approached.
111.title: Curves Ahead

choices: Truck!
Deer!
1111.content:
Jenny Braces her hands on the handle bars and grits her teeth. The bike continues barreling down the hill. The chain begins to slap against the frame from the back tire being bent. Jenny leans over as she starts into the turn. The back tire continues to wobble and it can be heard as it starts to skip into the air.
Determined Jenny pulls through the turn and begins to bring the bike upright. The bike is now soaring down the hill,the back end fish tailing. Jenny is doing all she can to control the bike when...
1111.title: Jenny is able to turn

11111.content:
"Truck!!" echoes through Jenny's head.
Her body freezes as the semi slams on it breaks. The sound of the air chambers and skidding rubber echoes through the street.
The truck with a gross weight of 28tons can by no means stop in time. The driver watches in horror as there is a loud thud when the bike hits the grill. Jenny is thrown from the bike before her arms go under the front steer tire crushing them instantly.
Jenny's body begins to tumble from the first set of tires before meeting the drive tires. Jenny's body is sucked under the set of 4 tires and dragged and ripped apart by the ABS as the driver continues to try to stop.
The remains are hit by the tandem tires out back along with the bike blowing out a tire.
50 feet later the truck comes to a stop. The traffic crawls past the truck a few minutes later. Adults and children complain wondering what is holding up there plans. The sight of the trail of what is left of Jenny is seen by many and quickly quiets the complaints. A year later the speed is dropped along the stretch of road.

The End
11111.title: Truck!

choices: Dramatic pause...
11112.content:
A deer standing in the middle of the road. Jenny jerks the wheel without thinking.
The bike flies over the gravel before the front tire strikes a ditch. Jenny goes flying into a small bush as the bike cartwheels into a tree.
11112.title: Deer!

choices: Continue to the Empire
Go Somewhere else
111121.content:
A couple of hours go by as Jenny lays in the bush. A couple of cars go by, the drivers with there minds set on there days plans don't notice the girl. The bike is seen a few times, but it looks like it fell off a truck and no one really cares.
A small baby squirrel runs into the bush and stops to look at Jenny. It head bobbing back and forth is the first sight that Jenny sees as she opens her eyes.
"Damn it. What the hell happened Bobby?" The squirrel looks at Jenny and then scampers off and up the tree. Jenny looks over at the tree at her bike. Jenny slowly gets to her feet.A few small scrapes, and a rip above her kneecap on her pants is all that the whole ordeal has done to Jenny.
"Guess I got lucky there Bobby." Jenny says looking up while walking towards the tree.
"Huh, now it matches" Jenny boast while looking at the bent front rim. Jenny picks up the bike and moves it back and forth a few times.
"Seems OK" Jenny says while setting the chain back into the sprockets. Jenny finds the cable that has frayed and broke going to her breaks and shortens it so she has breaks again.
"OK, that will about to do it."Jenny starts to get on the bike when something catches her eye. The bike dug a small rut next to the tree. Inside of the rut Jenny notices something reflecting the sunlight.
Jenny gets off of her bike, letting it fall to the ground. Her fingers begin to tear at the soil around the object until Jenny holds it in her hands. Jenny places it in her palm and starts to clean it with her thumb. The world around her seems to stop, as Jenny fixcates on the luster and the image that makes it self more promoniate with each pass of her thumb.
What is reveled is a small circle of symbols Jenny flips the coin over to a side that has nothing. The side is completely blank.
"That's weird" Jenny thinks as she starts to examine the coin some more.
"errrrrrrrrrrrrrrrreep" Jenny's stomach interrupts remind her of her current situation. Jenny stuffs the coin into her pocket and starts to head down the hill on her bike.
111121.title: A coin with no face

choices: Take her bike down into a glade area south of where the police are
Bike naked only 50 yards away from heavy traffic in a public park
1111211.content:
Heading downhill again, Jenny plans on peddling through the wooded areas of the southeastern portion of the large public park. As she swoops through a shaded area of sidewalk, past trees, benches, and a statue at a landmark, Jenny notices there are Police Squad Cars in the central area of the park. Most likely harassing street-people like her. "I'll just stick to the outer sidewalks, paths and trails if I have to", thinks the girl.

The trail through the tree-lined area takes her towards another slight ascent up the sidewalk, past an elderly couple, and towards a bench with...the "Perv".

"Oh, great.", thinks Jenny, as she pedals towards the skeevy bum who she's never spoken to, but who always seems to be undressing her with his those bloodshot eyes of his. Thus her nickname for the old bum("Perv") Even going uphill, she's got enough speed going that she's not worried about him bugging her(he never has, beyond eying her like a choice cut of meat).

Still, as she passes within yards of the derelict, Jenny feels that familiar sense of repulsion as the creep just stares blatantly at her, as if he's picturing her naked as she peddles past. Skinny legs pushing the pedals as she zooms towards another slight uphill ascent past the "Perv", Jenny looks back long enough to see the bum's eyes grow even wider, as she herself suddenly feels the chill Winter air over her entire body...because she's completely, instantly naked, riding a junk bike uphill with only her backpack still on!

Reaching the top of the small hill, Jenny nearly has her second wreck of the day, trying to cover-up her young bare body in the middle of a public setting! Skinny arms covering her small breasts, long legs tiptoed as she straddles the seat of her bicycle at the top of a public hill, Jenny is dumbstruck.

It's as if the "Perv" had somehow thought her clothes away or something! Jenny looks back down the hill, and the Perv is standing right where he was when she past him. He looks as dumbfounded as she feels, only he's already beginning to head up the hillock toward her, an evil grin on his smarmy face.

"What in Hell is going on, today?!?", Jenny almost screams. There's no way she's going to go back down the hill towards the Perv, so the only two choices are:
1111211.title: Continue to the Empire

choices: A smokey swirl and the smell of cooking from some dense bushes
A uniformed policeman, his back turned to her
11112111.content:
While she could easily outwalk the "Perv"(let alone run or bike), seeing him totter slowly up the slope towards her, shivering in the chill air, instills a new sense of urgency in Jenny, and standing on her peddles, rear high off the seat, she plunges onto forested ground, sparse with grasses, but rife with sticks, pepples and stones, and towards some thick clusters of bushes, with the intent of leaving the "Perv" literally "in the dust" behind her.

Jenny's only slight worry is that: by heading in that particular direction, she is put even closer to the general area of the Police Cruisers were parked as she was heading down the sidewalk minutes ago.

Already, she feels colder due to the shade breaks in the glades as she bumps along. Thankfully, the wind isn't as bad, though, so it's a toss-up. At least it's alittle less likely that she'll run into anyone here than on the main thoroughfare through the park, or on the sidewalk that circles round the huge expanse, where she was a minute ago. Ahead she is startled to see:
11112111.title: Take her bike down into a glade area south of w...

choices: Jenny empties the packback
Jenny decides to leave the Deacon
111121111.content:
Wisely rolling past the thick spread of bushes, Jenny hides her rickety bike and doubles back, a skinny, naked tween-aged girl sneaking-up on...
"Who goes there?", she hears the gravelly voice of an old man that she recognizes! "Show yourself! Hear me!"
"Well, so much for the ninja routine", thinks Jenny, as she replies, "It's mm-me, Deacon J...J-Jenny. You k-know, from the 'Block'" (both laugh)
Well, hell's bells! You about scared uncle D.J. half to the grave! (chuckles) Come on in and set a-spell, now Jenny. You sound like you're fit for a cold! You were about skin-n'-bones the last time I saw you. Help yourself to this possum I caught with mah traps.", invites the veteran hobo.
"I...I...can't, D.J."
"Well, why in Lord's Graces can't you, child?"
"I-I...lost my clothes back th-there", replies Jenny, shivering.
"Dear Lord, Jenny! You tryin' to get an old man thrown in the pokey again?!?" whispers Deacon J. harshly. "That's all I need with the Po-lice traipsin' all over the park is a naked little white kid to show up at mah hidey-hole!"
"Please, D-Deacon..."
"Lands! I knew I should have stayed down by the tunnel today", hisses the elderly man, who then proceeds to cover his face with his hands, "I ain't gonna peek, child. You come on in to the crib for a spell and we'll pour some of this soup down your skinny hide. Then, I'll let you stay in the sleeping-bag until we find you some clothes, dammit."
Jenny's stomach makes the familiar mewling sounds of hunger as she smells the pot of stew the old man has concocted on a tiny range deep inside the latticed network of brush inside the park.
As she tiptoes out of the bushes and does a dive towards the old hobo's sleeping-bag inside his makeshift tent, Deacon J. yells, "Holy Jesus, girl! You done lost ALL your clothes!"
Perhaps a tad too loudly, as you both suddenly stop, stock-still in your positions, as you hear a Police radio from what sounds like mere yards away.
Then you both hear a voice, smooth like silk, but flat, like something soulless speaking, saying, "It's here in the park somewhere, Captain. I can feel it. I MUST HAVE that coin. You and your men will help me find it. Do we understand each other, Captain Richards?"
"I'm doing everything in my power to help you in your search, Baron...", begins the usually hard-assed Captain Eubanks, who sounds positively flustered today, "these things can take some time, and we don't want to draw undue attention. If what you're telling me is correct, this coin's been missing for over two centuries --"
"SILENCE!", growls the "Baron"-creature(Jenny is certain something sounding that hollow could never have been truly alive), "That "coin" could be the key to TOTAL WORLD DOMINATION, fool!"
And with that, Deacon J. leans over and, grinning, whispers in her ear, perhaps to calm Jenny, "I wish both the Police and this Baron-thing would go on a week's vacation to Siberia, don't you, hon?"

And just as suddenly...nothing?

Nothing but steps, retreating back through the forested area to the central area of the park. Back to the Police Cruisers, which all rev up and depart, seemingly miraculously, from the scene.

"What the...", whispers Deacon J., looking as if he'd seen his own gravestone.

Looking at Jenny as if he was talking to a ghost, Deacon J. whispers(though there is no need now), "What you carryin' in that backpack, child?"
111121111.title: A smokey swirl and the smell of cooking from so...

choices: It is a cop
It is Deacons Daughter
1111211112.content:
"I... I.. Gotta go" Jenny says while walking towards her bike.
"Go Jenny who would you go I just got the stew ready." And, besides you cant go around naked like that." Deacon says before grabbing a stained towel from a tree branch and throwing it at Jenny.
"Here use this for now. We will find you some real clothes a little later."Deacon walks back towards the pot stiring it a few times.

Something is telling Jenny to go . But her rational mind quickly dismisses that as Jenny wraps the towel around herself. Decoan picks up a hubcap that he has been using as a bowel.. He dips the bowel into the pot and then hands it to jenny. The small of the stew enters Jenny's nostrils and the bowel is pressed to Jenny's lips. The stew runs down Jenny's throat and instantly begins to radiate the heat through her.. Jenny's hunger soon takes over as the bowl is tipped upward before the rest of the contence slides down her throat..
"Thank you" Jenny says while handing deacon the bowl.
Deacon dips the bowl into the pot and then sits down on a log.
A smile comes across Jenny's face as she looks back at Deacon. Jenny begins to think of how nice Deacon has been with her ever since they first meet.
Deacon sets the bowl down before walking into the bushes near by. Deacon mumbles something before the sound of urine hitting the ground can be heard.
"Hey, Hey you there" A voice yells from the street at Deacon.
1111211112.title: About to leave when

choices: Jenny goes
Jenny stays
11112111122.content:
"Damn it dad" the woman says before the sound of a car door can be heard being slammed.
"Co' mon now Samamtha you couldn't expect me to stay in a place like that?Deacon says while walking through the bush towards Jenny.
"Don't walk away dad" Samantha says before walking after him.
Jenny looks at Deacon in disbelief before she finally manages to conjure a sencentance.
"You have a daughter? Jenny asks when Deacon appears in front of her.

Deacon had told Jenny that his family was dead. Jenny was told that they were killed by a drunk driver when he first moved out here. Deacon fell into depression to the point where he couldn't stand people. Jenny was the first person that he was able to talk with since..
Jenny snaps her head up when she hears Deacons voice.
"Jenny maybe you should go." Deacon says looking at Jenny with desperation in his eyes.
11112111122.title: Deacons Daughter

choices: If jenny wants to come to her house
If her father has done anything to her
111121111222.content:
"Dad we have been worried sick " Samantha says as she bust through the bushes.
"Do you know how many people have been looking for....Samantha's speech is cut off as she notices the young girl.

Samantha looks at the young girl dirty head to toe, covered in just a towel, with a scared look on her face.
"What is your name dear" Samantha asks in a soothing voice.
Jenny looks over at Deacon who nods.
"My name is Jenny." Jenny says knowing the next question already she blurts it out.
"There dead. They died out west. I don't like to talk about it." Jenny demands before looking at the ground.
Jenny stands up waiting for the next question from the lady. Samantha asks
111121111222.title: Jenny stays

choices: In a flash of intuition, Jenny puts it together
Jenny doesn't get it, and dashes for cover along with the transformed cop
111121112.content:
Life on the street has made Jenny a little pessimistic and, as she sees the cop's back, she knows it's inevitable that he'll turn and catch her before she can duck out of sight. This moment of weary apprehension could be interpreted as an unspoken wish.

The cop whirls around smartly to face her, moving with such grace and speed that it looks more like a dance move than a natural shift of stance. Jenny feels a rush of adrenaline, along with a spreading blush. He'll probably arrest her for indecent exposure.

"Hold it right there!" shouts the cop. "You're under arrest for indecent exposure!"

As he starts to approach, muttering about how this "ain't no album cover, kid," Jenny feels her eyes tearing up. If only he knew what it was like...

Jenny gasps. The cop's vanished, replaced by a girl her own age with a junk bike and an outfit consisting of... a backpack.
111121112.title: Enforced empathy

choices: Jenny wishes the cop back to form, apologizes to him, and splits
Jenny leaves cop-girl as is, having been lonely and in need of a friend for ages
1111211121.content:
Jenny realizes weird stuff started happening to her after she found that coin. Only she'd put it in her pocket, and she's a little light on those at the moment.

As Jenny takes her backpack off for a peek inside, the transformed cop squeals like a naked girl and runs with his (well, her) bike for the bushes. Jenny, distracted, idly wishes cop-girl had some clothes on and would calm down. At the thought, the cop-girl is wearing an exact copy of Jenny's recently vanished outfit and stops running, looking around in confusion.

Jenny rips into her backpack, seeing the coin on top of her 'permanent vacation' stuff. It must have been trying to stay with her, otherwise it would have vanished with her pants or clinked down the side of her leg once... once the Perv had wished she was naked! That was the only explanation for that! She'd passed by him close enough that the coin must have triggered on his thoughts.

"I wish you'd only respond to my wishes," says Jenny, taking the coin in hand. She probably doesn't need to say it aloud, but it can't hurt. "And that I had my clothes back on!"

It feels odd to have her clothes jump back into existence on her, but Jenny sighs with relief all the same.

"What... just happened?" asks the cop-girl, walking over to Jenny. She looks as though she's trying to remember something very important and failing completely. The cop's been changed into what he might have looked like if he swapped genders and regressed a dozen or so years, which is a relief. If he'd been an exact duplicate of Jenny, the overall freakiness might have pushed Jenny over the edge.
1111211121.title: "That thing I dug up!"

choices: Jenny visits a little poetic justice on the Perv
Jenny's annoyed enough to not give her vengeance much thought
11112111211.content:
Jenny's mind is racing. Should she tell the newly transformed girl what's going on? Should she make something up so the cop-girl doesn't get mad? Should she just wish everything back the way it was before the cop turned around, get out of here, and collect her thoughts?

Jenny decides for a little of everything.

"I was mad at cop-you, because I was naked and knew you'd bust me, so I wished on this coin-thing I dug out from near a tree a little bit ago, only I didn't know I was wishing because I didn't know it was a wishing coin yet, and..."

Jenny trails off, because cop-girl is lost.

"I'm a very powerful witch, and..." Jenny begins, giving the Potter defense up as soon as it's uttered. Cop-girl looks impatient. In a teen girl way, rather than an authoritarian "I got a gun and a badge!" way.

"I wish we could rewind this entire stupid thing!" said Jenny, huffing.

And Jenny's naked again, astride her bike, looking at the back of a cop.

Clothes, first, followed by "The cop never notices me," and the "My wishes only" clause.

And although there are many, many things to think about right now, Jenny focuses on something more practical: revenge!

-- -- --

Back uphill, back downhill. Jenny grins, because the Perv's still stationed at his bench. He's having a pull from a bottle in a paper bag, his eyes all sort of far away. Remembering Jenny biking past nude, naturally!

She's had to put up with this creepy guy before, but recent events have given her an idea on how best to get him back.
11112111211.title: Mulligan

choices: Jenny retreats deeper into the park to get her bearings, feeling guilty
Jenny is inspired by her mischief, and goes out looking for more!
111121112111.content:
Before the Perv can even lay his filthy eyes on her again, Jenny's already wishing. She makes a lot of wishes after the first, since the ideas just keep getting better as she goes.

The opener is obvious, or so it seemed to her when she gave it some thought. In the twinkling of an eye (bloodshot or otherwise), the Perv is transformed into just the sort of girl he'd like to drool over. Perv-girl is stunningly cute, exuding pert tween allure (Ugh! Jenny knew he liked them even younger!) and fully deserving of her own sitcom. She's in a halter top, flip-flops, and short short-shorts, everything shaded in cutesy pastels. Jenny has to fight from laughing out loud, because she's not done yet.

As Perv-girl is discovering how jaw-droppingly wonderful she is, Jenny gets to work on the seat. Several full-sized vanity mirrors spring into existence around the back of the park bench and angle over the top in a shroud so that Perv-girl can see herself from multiple angles. Lush red upholstery appears, and the bench makes itself as comfortable as possible. Quite comfortable, with plenty of functional, miniaturized amenities, because Jenny's decided the altered Perv is going to be there for a while.

After the fridge/freezer/microwave combo and teensy toilet/shower assembly have bookended the park bench, Jenny's having second thoughts. Perv-girl, however, unlike cop-girl, has maintained 'his' original mind, mentally remaining a dirty old man. Maybe Jenny wished for that, just a little? Perv-girl starts trying to worm out of her skimpy wardrobe to get a good luck at herself, so Jenny proceeds without remorse.

A whole bunch of fully automated and highly technical devices appear, completely lining the rear of the bench as the mirrors twist and flow to accommodate them. One is a containment field generator, so no one can get to Perv-girl and, more importantly, she can't escape either. Another starts bumping out a light show to accent Perv-girl and churns some bass-rich porn groove.

The rest of the stuff is to make Perv-girl happy. Really, really happy.

Jenny stops with the wishes, feeling tapped out and a little ashamed of herself. The first ones to see Perv-girl in action are the elderly couple Jenny had passed on her way up, the first time. They stand in shock as Perv-girl's orgasmatronic park bench proceeds to slick her down with perfumed oil that disintegrates her scanty garb before leaping in with... oodles of other stuff. It's all sucking, slurping, and merciless vibratory assault with a thick frosting of Perv-girl moans and squeals as Jenny turns her back and splits.

"I can always undo it later, if I want," Jenny tells herself. Still, she wonders if that was the best way to apply her newfound power.
111121112111.title: The Perv's just deserts

choices: Some girls in the park who always give her a hard time
The hot dog vendor who refused to sell to her last week
1111211121112.content:
Jenny endured a few minutes' worth of conscience pangs for her punishing of the Perv, but it wasn't that bad, really. He was having the time of his life, wasn't he? Just... as a girl. So perhaps it was possible to pull the strings of reality in such a way as to entertain herself without putting the manipulated in too uncomfortable of a position...

"I think I'll be playfully naughty rather than outright evil," Jenny says to herself, not feeling strongly enough about it to put it to a wish. Still, she wants to properly represent her status to future victims, so she engages in another string of wishes. She changes her hair and outfit black (elevating both considerably from 'homeless' chic), sprouts a cute pair of black bat wings fringed with pink fur, and places her beloved bike and street survival backpack safely in an 'elsewhere' condition until she requires them again. And decides on a tiny pair of horns as well, why not? Black, with pink tips.

"Oh... and, also..." Jenny says, flapping her wings listlessly. She makes one more wish -- more of a directed inquiry, in truth -- just to confirm. Yes! The coin will allow for unlimited wishes. Wishing for more detailed knowledge about the coin seems to bring Jenny's mind into contact with Another, so she intentionally keeps that line of inquiry short. Even that brief contact convinces her that the Controlling Unknown is rooting for her to become honorable and responsible rather than venal and corrupt as she makes her wishes, which makes Jenny feel a little uncomfortable. The last thing she wants right now is to sweat details like being benevolent and using her power for the greater good.

"I'll get to all that world peace jazz, eventually," Jenny says, talking to the coin in her hand, "but I'm permitted a little time to mess around now because I've been homeless for a while, so I hope you'll forgive me."

Thus letting herself off the hook for the many indulgences she foresees in her near future, Jenny considers catching up with...
1111211121112.title: A taste for semi-sweet wickedness

choices: Jenny decides some 'naked' aggression is called for...
Jenny has another idea...
11112111211121.content:
Jenny tries her wings and, with only a little wishing, is soon steady in flight. It's fun to swoop around the park, regardless of the few people who see her and run away screaming. She only lets them scamper around in fear for a little while before wishing they'd chill out. Soon, Jenny's able to fly around a large area without causing much distress among the other visitors.

Approaching the spot where she used to scrounge for food, Jenny sees Alison, Lisa, and Trish hanging out at their favorite table overlooking the park's biggest playground. They look as pampered and jaded as ever, deep into a snarky session of people watching. What else is new?

Jenny ends a skillful glide into a nearby tree with barely a flap of her wings, perching on a branch as she determines the fate of the stuck-up girls.
11112111211121.title: Doom of the snoblings

choices: "I think some potty-mouthed girls need to be turned into nice, chichi urinals!"
"Why don't we see how -you- like being scrutinized and commented on, hmm?"
111121112111211.content:
"Look at that geek!" Alison says, calling attention to a father pushing his son on a swing. "Can you believe he wore that shirt with khaki pants?" As leader of the pack, Alison felt it necessary to spot and point out new targets for the group's venom. She's good at it, too.

"It's what happens when little nerds grow up," Lisa responds, deciding the guy isn't interesting enough to snap a pic of for later humiliation on her blog. "He looks like he dropped a load in those high-water Dockers. God. Who lets them out of the house?"

"Someone wasn't doing her job in high school," says Trish, tone distracted as she busily texts away on her cell. "He should have crushed on a suicide machine like moi, gotten properly rejected, and eaten daddy's .38 before prom."

A pause from the other two.

"Damn, Trish!" says Lisa, but she's grinning along with Alison. As the newest third, Trish feels the need to be harsher in an effort to win her spurs.

Jenny hears all of this from overhead and only gets angrier. These girls are vicious! She's had her fill of them several times in the past, but never knew how cold they are. It makes things so easy...

"Oh my fucking GOD!!" Alison shrieks, realizing she's suddenly completely naked. Jenny messes with her, putting her in a duplicate of that shirt with khaki pants for a few seconds. And then back to naked again.

There's more cursing from Lisa and Trish, who are both at a loss over Alison's nudity -- followed by screams as they get naked, too. The girls' hip and ultra au courant cells fly up in an orbit around them, snapping pictures for Lisa's blog.

"Stand still and shut up!" Jenny says, dropping out of the tree and landing among them. She wishes that anyone who heard the initial screams from the group would ignore the disturbance and go back to what they were doing, along with failing to notice the spectacle of three naked girls on the obvious vantage. There's time enough for that later.

Jenny's three playthings stand stock-still and mute, as commanded, looking as though they really wish they could cuss some more. The helpless rage in their eyes goads Jenny on rather than chastening her, and she considers what's next for them as tears course down their flushed faces.
111121112111211.title: Down to the buff

choices: She turns the naked threesome into a fountain
She thinks of something even more fiendish...
1111211121112112.content:
Jenny takes her time thinking something up for the miserable trio, telling them exactly why she decided to torment them in the first place. It only seems to make Alison and her friends more angry. Their eyes bulge wider with inexpressible fury, anyway.

"I think it's only fair that you guys put on a little show for the all the people you've ridiculed, but I'm afraid I might go too far and wind up being as rotten as you," says Jenny. "Wouldn't it be terrible to get caught naked and slagged on by all the people you can't imagine ever being nice to?"

Jenny has the perfect idea, and implements it at once.
1111211121112112.title: Whims for the stitchless

choices: Jenny goes off to cheer herself up with somewhat more innocent fun
Jenny thinks the best thing would be to take a nap
11112111211121121.content:
"...and we've put the dividends from that municipal bond drive to work, ladies and gentlemen, in what's sure to keep the citizens and, more importantly, the children of our city..."

Jenny zones out, having decided to wish herself a few months from now with some very specific conditions. She's in the crowd gathered around the tarped display in the middle of the playground, listening to the mayor carry on about what a boon to the community this new decorative structure will be. She could cut right to the chase, but it's sometimes more fun to build things up. Like it's fun to stand around in a group of regular people looking like some grrrly-punk demoness and not have anyone bat an eye.

"...in the spirit of Debouvrie's effort in Brussels, which could hardly be called a blight on that fair metropolis..."

Jenny blinks, waving a finger and fast forwarding just a bit.

"...entitled, not without artistic levity, 'Wee Three Snobs! Hit it, gentlemen!"

An abbreviated roll on a snare drum, and the tarp's pulled aside.

Most of the kids start screaming with laughter at once, and Jenny joins in. In fact, she hits the ground with laughter and clenches her fingers in the sand.

Alison, Lisa, and Trish are all naked, cast in limestone. Only Jenny knows they're actual girls, each one hideously aware of her condition despite being inanimate. The three are stooped together in a circle, bracing against each other's butts, as they squat to relieve themselves. Jenny knows they're furious enough right now to have strokes, assuming they were still flesh and blood, which is exactly what she'd hoped for. Still, their upturned faces are petrified in expressions of blissful contentment, and no one's aware of the toxically bad vibes radiating from the fountain. When the spigots are turned on, with ceremony, even the adults are prostrate.

The mayor merely smiles throughout the hysterics, a responsible civic leader, and poses for the photo op.

-- -- --

People eventually collect themselves, and a general picnic gets underway. Jenny takes alternating bites from sandwiches in either hand, listening in as several children on the rim of the fountain swap comments about those girls' "icky wee-wees."

Jenny wishes herself forward a bit more, and sees the predictable: kids visiting the playground make a game of trying to cut the flow of 'pee' from the fountain's principals. She realizes it's been costly to maintain the plumbing with all of the sand smashed into the snobs' crotches, so Jenny wishes for a refinement in the pipes that makes it a non-issue. The kids can pound sand to their hearts' content.

Further forward, and the playground's the center of urban decay. The fountain's dry, the statuesque girls have been thoroughly tagged (special attention given to their privates, with no end of competing initials, gang signs, whatever), and someone's broken off Alison's head for a trophy. They're just statues now. Any continuing mental life that remained trapped following their transformation has slipped away, finally.

-- -- --

Jenny reverses in a hurry, wishing herself back to the point where she's still considering how to handle Alison, Lisa, and Trish. She's so depressed that she actually apologizes to the three immobile snob girls, though they haven't experienced a thing aside from nudity and silent inertness, right now.

"That was naughtier than I had in mind," says Jenny, with no lingering appetite for malice. She dumps her silly demon disguise and goes back to just being Jenny, releasing the three from their frozen, speechless state.

Before they can attack her or even scream abuse, Jenny wishes they'd walk down to the playground, talk to the guy who was pushing his son on the swing, and...

Patching it up as best she can, Jenny has the three naked girls each take a swing and let the man in the khaki pants push them in turn. She wishes no one would find this amusing or even odd, and Jenny caps it off by wishing that this strange afternoon will become the thin end of the wedge that leaves Alison and her friends eventually becoming nicer girls.

"I still feel like crap," Jenny announces, walking past the swingset and remembering a dark possible future.
11112111211121121.title: Getting dedicated

choices: Jenny dreams of pancakes, and wakes to find the city in pretty weird shape...
Jenny has another dream of something weirder. Hope it's not a nightmare...
111121112111211212.content:
Jenny knows the best way to deal with how she's feeling, since she generally retreats from the gloominess of her situation by sleeping. She splits from the playground and heads for a -- what else? -- stand of trees.

Even though she could wish herself into the best hotel in town, Jenny's gotten used to living on the street and now tends to think in hardscrabble terms.

It doesn't take her long. She opens with the familiar injunction against being noticed, makes the chosen tree a little bigger, yawns hugely as a treehouse doughnuts into existence halfway up the trunk, and begins plodding up the unwinding spiral staircase to the front door.

Inside, everything's just the way she'd like it. She kicks her shoes off, checks the wood-panelled fridge (in all the excitement, she's forgotten she started out for something to eat), decides to wish for a big plate of pancakes instead, and wolfs the buttery, syrupy stack down while chasing it with a glass of cold milk. Jenny's stomach is tight with her meal, and the sense of fulfillment is so intense that she almost feels like weeping with pleasure.

She does sob with relief in the shower, the first truly hot one she's had in some time, but the steaming water washes her tears away.

Towelling off, Jenny stumbles half-asleep into the bedroom. She's feeling modest after the going-over she gave Alison and company, so she wishes up a soft set of pajamas rather than slumbering in the raw. Not comfortable with setting the wish coin down just anywhere, even in her own hidden treehouse, Jenny rigs the token with a watchstrap and wears it like a timepiece.

The cool metal on her wrist is the last conscious sensation she has for some time. Jenny falls asleep as though plunging down a mineshaft.

-- -- --

As with the hot shower, it's been nearly as long since Jenny's had a decent amount of sleep. On the street, she's always tense and sleeping with a proverbial eye open, which means she dozes more than genuinely rests. In a proper bed, she's zonked deep for some time in dreamless oblivion.

Later, as Jenny begins surfing on ever more choppy delta waves, she can't help dreaming. And since a dream is a wish your heart makes, yada yada...
111121112111211212.title: Forty winks

choices: Jenny prepares the three snobs for some lighter-than-air antics
Jenny keeps thinking about it, having several different ideas
11112111211121122.content:
Jenny thinks turning Alison and her friends into statues in the park would be pretty funny, but then there's no chance to see their appalled expressions. Sure, she could establish some sort of limited telepathy to gauge how aghast they are at being on helpless display, but that's not the same as watching them freak out.

Jenny kicks it around some more, her new 'friends' not about to go anywhere. She floats a notion that would destroy their precious self-images, but also thinks up a few different flavors of mortification.
11112111211121122.title: Floating format

choices: They've had enough, letting the chastised snoblings go
She's just getting warmed up, and thinks of another bubbly torment for them
111121112111211221.content:
Jenny likes the idea she just had, and a sphere pops into existence around the motionless trio. It looks like a giant soap bubble, a touch of oily sheen running through the transparency. Jenny lets the girls talk and move again, all three screaming as they punch and kick uselessly at their new container. No sound's allowed out, which just makes their impotent rage funnier.

"Might as well go and meet your audience!" Jenny tells the three, heading down the hill. Alison, Lisa, and Trish look around in terror before they turn back and try to plead their way out of this. They look really sincere as they beg for mercy, but Jenny can't hear a word.

-- -- --

"Check it out!" a boy on the playground yells, pointing at what's rolling over the sand toward the jungle gym. A crowd forms in a hurry, and Jenny tweaks their reactions for the desired effect.

It doesn't take much meddling. All the kids squeal with laughter and point at the three naked girls, who've huddled together as they try to hide their nudity and continue to scream their inaudible curses at whoever their eyes fix on. Several kids try to pop Alison, Lisa and Trish free, but their efforts only send an elastic wobble through the sphere. And knock the girls on their asses, since the interior's pretty slick. That becomes the game for a few minutes, the bebubbled repeatedly brought down every time they stand.

Everyone peers up at Jenny from time to time, trying to figure out what part the demon grrl's playing in all of this. Jenny stands on top of the bubble, wishing a thing into place that finishes off looking like a bellows combined with an industrial wet/dry vacuum wrapped around a helium tank. It welds itself to the outside of the bubble, and Jenny grabs a throttle as it grows out of the device. She knows the prop isn't really necessary, but it's a little embarrassing for her to be presenting the mean girls like this, and it's nice to have some 'business' to fuss with for distraction.

Tumbled over again, the three girls nearly froth at their mouths with ire as Jenny pulls the throttle and lightens the atmosphere for them. The three try to keep their feet on the slick concavity they've been floundering on, but can't stop themselves as they get lighter and lighter. Alison and her friends scream silently, balanced on tiptoe, before becoming completely airborne.

If the situation wasn't humiliating enough before, this new twist makes up for it. It's a lot harder to hide yourself when you're trying to 'swim' in a weightless condition. Alison and crew put on quite a show as they flail, still shouting, rolling around in midair. Their cowlike ungainliness under present circumstance is the cherry on top, and Jenny falls to her knees in laughter along with most of the playground crowd.

Jenny thinks it might be better if all assembled knew why the snoblings were being held up to ridicule like this, and so an image of each girl with their full names and nastiest quotes appears on the bubble's surface. Taking it a step further, Jenny wishes the three bubblees would be cursed with thought bubbles, and the young snobs sprout a progression of puffy white ellipses from their heads with current thoughts scrolling in black text within.

((Don't kick me, you bitch!!)) appears above Alison's head, Lisa having accidentally nudged off of her with a foot.

((How the @#$% is she doing this??!!)) Lisa wants to know about Jenny and her revenge, oblivious to the fact that Alison is getting pissy with her. Alison shouts the curse a second or so after thinking it, though no one outside can hear. This leads to a shrieking match between the two, their lips flapping in pantomime as their thought bubbles brim over with grawlixes.

((This isn't so bad...)) Trish thinks, ignoring everyone else as she enjoys flying around. Jenny shrugs. If Trish can have fun zipping about in midair in front of a crowd, naked, as her friends are having a screaming fit nearby, she probably deserves the thrill.

Before Alison and Lisa can get into a full-on cat fight, Jenny reminds them why they're here to begin with. Twisting the throttle of her weird machine, Jenny gets the vacuum going. Alison is sucked, ass first, to the top of the bubble. Her butt bounces off the interior, and Jenny's waiting to jump up and land firmly on those cheeks. There's only a thin membrane between her pink-and-black Docs and the vulnerable rump of Snobling Prime, and it's no defense at all.

It's an immediate crowd pleaser! Kids and caregivers alike go nuts as the snotty Alison has her ass stomped, applauding as she shoots back to the bottom of the bubble. Lisa's next, just missing a collision with Alison on the way down. Jenny leaves Trish alone, alternating her trampoline revenge between Alison and Lisa. Their thought balloons are boiling with such unmentionable filth that the color of the symbol crawl turns a flashing red.

After several minutes of this, Jenny decides...
111121112111211221.title: Height of silent sound

choices: "Absolutely not." (At which point Jenny gets even!)
"Very well." (At which point Jenny's in for it!)
11112111211122.content:
Jenny's still hungry and, being in the park, that only reminds her of a stop she should make.

OK, so she would occasionally try to cadge a free frank off of the hot dog vendor when she saw him. They had an understanding: she didn't make a pest of herself, but he insisted she at least ask for a freebie rather than mope around waiting for him to surrender. It was an OK arrangement.

The week previous, though, Kevin had been off the route and a new girl had taken his place. She was probably in college and looked a lot more severe than slacker Kevin, wearing a starched white uniform and standing by the cart at attention. Jenny hadn't been surprised at how things had turned out. She'd asked politely for a 'sample,' got shot down, got some recyclables together, came back from the recycling station with a handful of honest change... and got turned down again!

"This isn't a soup kitchen," the hot dog girl had said. Her response had been heartlessly indifferent, almost mechanical, as she'd ignored Jenny's hard-won fundage. And then she'd prepped herself a hot dog and eaten it in one gulp, right in front of Jenny! Without any comment, or a nasty smile, or anything. She just broadcast her coldness expressionlessly.

"I wish she's still running the cart today!" Jenny says, with a sour grin.

-- -- --

The girl is there, either because she actually had the shift or because of Jenny's wish. Jenny approaches and makes herself look as inoffensive as possible.

"You again," says hot dog girl, without malice. It's not anything in her eyes that makes her seem insensitive. Maybe it's the way she stands?

Jenny has a strange impulse and goes with it. She holds her hand out, bouncing the wish coin in it, and offers it to hot dog girl. Her palm has gone sweaty around the token, and a cool breeze seems to rise in warning against the chance she's taking.

"This is a wishing coin," Jenny says. "Honest. I'll trade it to you for all the hot dogs I can eat." Jenny doesn't dump the prohibition against anyone else making wishes on the coin yet, but she's prepared to. The gamble makes her feel incredibly odd, as if the coin has no wish to change hands and is struggling on a metaphysical level to retain its current owner.

Hot dog girl looks with inexhaustible disinterest at Jenny's wish coin and says...
11112111211122.title: Mustard on my roll

choices: "She is just some kid . I think she is homeless."
"Yes, she is my crazy little sister."
111121112111222.content:
The coin is snatched by the hot dog lady as she opens the lid containing the hot dogs. There is a burst of stram then a smell that quickly enters Jenny's nostrils. Jenny looks at the hot dog lady then takes a step closer to the stand awaiting her first hotdog.
The hot dog lady smiles as she looks at Jenny before slamming the lid down. A look of regret and disbelief comes over Jennys face as the hot dog lady begins to laugh.
"oh..Ohh priceless.. You actually thought I was going to give you one for this peice of shit" The hot dog lady continues to cackle her every insult tearing into what little hope Jenny had left.Then the hot dog lady said something that took Jenny by surprise.
"ohh you little twit, I just wish you could have seen the look on your face when that lid came down pricel......"
Jenny found herself standing behind the booth with one hand on the lid and the other grasping the coin before she slams the lid down.The young girl before her looks like she has lust been told her mom died before she begins to shake her head. The hot dog lady and Jenny regain control of them selfs.
"Wha.. What happened.The girl says looking up at once was her body.
"Jenny opens the lid and plops a dog on a bun. She doesn't feel hungry but doesn't wan to take her chances.

"But, that is impossible!" the young girl says screaming. A police officer walking through the park hears the screams and begins to walk toward the young girl.

"You you can't do this! You tricked me you fucking witch! Change me back!!!" The desperation can be heard in the young girls voice as she realizes her fate rest with Jenny.
Jenny's hand runs from her side, across her 19 year old belly , over her now ample breast before stopping on her chin.
"Humm, I dont know it does seem.."Jenny is inturpted as the police officer makes himself present.
"Young lady. There are children in this park. You can't be saying things like tha......."the cop stops as he notices how dirty the young girl is.
"Where are your parents?" the cop asks.
"I..I..." is all The little girl can munster.

"Do you know this girl" The cop said while grabibng the young girls arm so she would not run off.
Jenny feels the coin in her now 19 year old hand before saying...
111121112111222.title: Tricked

choices: Jenny decides to force-feed Tori with hot dogs
Jenny has another idea that seems more interesting...
1111211121112222.content:
"It's just my crazy little sister, officer," says Jenny, in Hot Dog Girl's body. She quickly firewalls the coin again with a mental wish, because she can see HDG, in Jenny's body, getting ready to make a verbal wish herself. No sense in losing her body to this rotten chick, to get shuffled off into the city's hopelessly snarled social services network by some busybody cop.

Though, really, that's not a terrible idea... Hot Dog Girl would get a taste of what life was like away from her cooshy hot dog job. Jenny knew that snaky girl would try to snake her, but she had to leave no room for doubt. Now, Jenny thinks she'll serve as a strict teacher in Hot Dog Girl's long-neglected moral instruction.

"Well, crazy little sis should watch her mouth," says the cop, letting go of Jenny's -- err, HDG's -- arm and looking as though he might buy a hot dog. He changes his mind. "That can go down as a beef for disturbing the peace, you know? Take care."

Jenny makes as though she's scolding HDG, and the cop wanders off. A lot of cops in the park today!

"OK, enough with 'Hot Dog Girl,'" says Jenny, shutting HDG down with a wish. No movement, no lipping off. "What's your name, anyway?"

"Victoria," says Jenny/HDG, appearing as though she'd rather bite her tongue in half than say it.

"Well, Tori," Jenny says, knowing she'll hate having her name shortened, "what do you think I'm going to do with you now?"
1111211121112222.title: Switcheroo

choices: Jenny decides she'll feed Tori until she literally turns into a hot dog
Jenny thinks it would be funnier to make Tori inflate (explosion optional)
11112111211122221.content:
"You'd better undo whatever you've done," says Tori, cold as ever. Jenny takes time to point out to Tori that she only has herself to blame, tucking the coin into a starched white pocket. Man, how could Tori stand this rotten outfit? Jenny wishes it to relax a little. It's hard getting used to the new luggage up top, and she doesn't need crisp corners digging into her.

Having a look at herself from outside, Jenny's saddened. She wishes her old kid body clean, gives it a haircut, gives it some new clothes, generally spiffs it up. Doing so proves to be at least a little traumatic. Jenny's no stranger to self-pity -- not a luxury, when you're homeless -- but now, effectively outside of herself, she sees how badly she's been used by an unkind world. The grooming's an acknowledgment of that, rather than an attempt to make Tori more comfortable.

"I know you're pretty hungry," Jenny tells Tori, and feels a little cheated to realize that, in Tori's body, she's not. She'd been hoping for a hot dog, but now doesn't have any appetite. "What you need is... all the hot dogs you can eat!"

Tori scowls, and Jenny makes up her mind. She grabs a roll from the bread box, juggles a hot dog out with tongs, and assembles the finished product with condiments in the prep area. Tori's body has some muscle memory going or something, because Jenny flies through the process like she's been doing it for years.

"Here you go!" says Jenny, all smiles. Tori accepts the hot dog, unable to disguise a sliver of gratitude, and chows down.

-- -- --

"You're gonna give yourself a gutache, kid," says an older man, watching Tori/Jenny's body with concern.

Tori's drawn a small crowd, patrons who'd come over for a hot dog and stopped to watch the show with the same interest they'd reserve for a traffic accident. Tori's up to her twelfth hot dog, under the influence of Jenny and her wishing coin. Tori the Hot Dog Girl wanted to behave like a cold engine of nastiness, and now she's essentially a frank-scarfing machine. Jenny feels a pang of sympathy, not for Tori, but for her poor old body. A quick wish sets that right; Jenny pulls another body swap, changing her former body to Tori's, at 13, and taking what will eventually be her own nineteen-year-old body for her current shell. And, naturally, wishing that none of the onlookers would find this sudden change unusual. Jenny starts to wish she had a mirror, just to get a glimpse of how she'll turn out, but decides to worry about that later. The important thing right now is packing one hot dog after another into Tori.

It's much more gratifying to see Kid Tori with mustard, ketchup, and relish all over her face. That messiness is more becoming to a suburban princess with silver spoon scars on her tongue. Tori's down more than a few notches by now, but Jenny thinks they're just getting warmed up.

Tori finishes a hot dog, and Jenny makes another one, the girls effective as a two-person assembly line. Occasionally, someone else actually wants to order, and Jenny gives them what they want. Her change belt is starting to get heavy, and Jenny has to wish the excess coins into wrappers in a locked drawer in the cart. She wishes the cart to be replenished as well, once she notices she's running low of certain supplies. Tori's not getting out of this that easily.

"Hey, lay off!" says a kid, giving Jenny a look of wondering dread. "You're gonna make her explode!"

"I wouldn't do that!" Jenny says, offering a sweet smile as Tori's eyes show white all the way around.
11112111211122221.title: They plump when you cook 'em

choices: Tori's clothes split and burst off of her like overstressed sausage skins!
Tori explodes in a gout of chewed bun, wiener, and sauce! Duck!
111121112111222212.content:
By Tori's fourth hot dog -- three hot dogs before people started gathering -- Jenny had already wished she'd be unable to puke. At the same time, she'd wished that there'd be no pain or even mild physical discomfort to distract Tori from the awful mental awareness of what was happening to her. It was more fun that way.

Jenny realizes it's going to take too long to properly inflate Tori with this hand-to-mouth business. Mechanical intervention seems called for, as earlier with the Perv.

While Tori works her way through another hot dog, Jenny wishes for a particular button that will convert the hot dog cart into something suitable. Suddenly, there it is, with an inlaid plastic logo arranged around the top in a semicircle: The Frank-Infurnel Radical Expander!

"Revenge is a dish best served hot!" Jenny shouts, hitting the button and clapping her hands. Tori looks like she's going to come unhinged, since the current hot dog torture is more than enough for her.

After Jenny hits the F-IRE button, there's a lot of clanking from inside the cart. Sterile, metallic attachments began emerging, along with a substantial appendage that leans up and over, reminiscent of a scorpion's tail; it's mostly a length of clear plastic tubing, accordioned for flexibility, terminating in a faceplate with goofy silver teeth around either side.

The faceplate springs forward and adheres to Tori's screeching mug, latching into place just below her nose and anchoring under her chin. The goofy teeth click tight along her jaw, going into action with a whirr as she finishes her last "polite" hot dog; these are apparently going to force her to keep chewing, but the visual effect makes the lower half of Tori's face resemble a giant pair of choppers.

The less sensational devices get to work and, soon, a dozen freshly-made hot dogs are vacuumed up by the Frank-Infernul's delivery nozzle and conveyed to Tori's mouth.

The crowd shrieks with exactly the revolted fascination that Jenny's feeling, exposed to a real-life example of cartoon horror. Tori screams deep in her throat before the Frank-Infernul's supporting dentition whirrs back to life and forces her to start chewing at low mach.

Jenny's quick to shoot a string of wishes at her coin, wanting this to go just right. No suffocation, no rescue, no possible escape, etc. Everyone else seems to think the show is Tori's gnashing teeth, but Jenny takes a good look at her and realizes the only thing worth watching is her eyes. She looks as though she's staring into hot dog hell.

Tori braces a foot against the cart, her expensive Nike sliding off with a squeak as she drops to her knees and thrashes her head around in a futile effort to get free. The Frank-Infurnel muzzle tracks right along with her, keeping up the stream of hot dogs. Soon, understandably, Tori's stomach starts to distend, getting rounder.

The Frank-Infurnel extends a padded rest, red as a devil's tongue, to support the expanding Tori, her stomach beyond the size of a beach ball and only getting bigger. Her clothing is either under the effects of the machine or else made of some extremely forgiving spandex blend, as it swells without threat of ripping. Tori's blouse rucks up just enough to show her belly button, which is more a shadow of a pucker than a proper navel by now. The metal jaws keep whirring, the rendering hose keeps up with a steady Suck!/Schloof! of hot dog transport, and the tiny utensils of the frankfurter arrangement engine keep clinking and tinkling away, making more hot dogs.

Jenny's more privately surprised than anyone else watching this -- her older body is all squirms and flutters as Tori inflates, some element in the display sort of a turn-on. Ooh!

Tori angles her head up and presses her hands to her expanding tummy, eyes round with alarm. If this keeps up...

At that moment, there's a low, purring rip. Suddenly...
111121112111222212.title: Tori versus The Frank-Infurnel Radical Expander

choices: The parking lot
The beach

Tori finds her efforts to move becoming weak as her body stiffens and swells. The crowd watches as the Frank-Infernul emits a slurry of steam and comes to a stop. The faceplate and attachments subside back into the hotdog cart. Tori feels her legs merging and her eyes go wide at feeling her belly moving down over her midsection. There is an oily feeling across Tori's face as her eyes begin to sting. She feels the fat roll over her hips griping to her legs causing her lower calf to thicken. Tori's watches as the haze over her eyes becomes thicker. Feeling her body being squeezed and getting tighter becomes relaxing. The world turn on its side suddenly as weightless takes over her.
The sight of a pool comes into view before Tori is submerged in the water. Bubbles tickle against Tori's skin before she comes to the surface and notices something terrifying. Looking down at her is Jenny with a grin across her face. The end of a pair of tongs wrap around Tori's plump body squeezing her before she is laid down onto a soft pillow.
"Here you go it is on the house." Jenny says to a hungry young dirty boy who has been watching her from behind a tree. Quickly the young boy wanders over and snatches the hotdog smiling at Jenny and then runs back behind the tree sitting down with the hotdog in the bun.
Jenny looks around and smiles wickedly leaving the cart behind as she walks down the sidewalk toward...
1111211121112222121.title: You are what you eat

choices: "...one of us was big enough to make some changes around this rotten town!"
"...we were small enough that no one would bother us at all!"
1111211122.content:
Jenny has no clue at all what just happened. Cops don't turn into naked girls with bikes and backpacks, any more than Pervs can think girls' clothes off. Jenny makes the leap of placing the blame with the Perv, convinced he's manipulating things somehow.

"Hey, come on, hide!" Jenny calls to the other girl. "There's this pervert running around who can zap your clothes off and... and turn regular people into naked girls! If he can do all that, we don't want him catching us!"

The two got their junky bikes (junky in exactly the same way, even if neither of them notice) tucked deep in a stand of scrub oak and ivy, and tried to find a comfortable way to hide themselves.

"Well, nobody turned me into anything!" says the newcomer. "I was just biking along, trying to get to the Empire for something to eat, when my clothes disappeared! I think that Perv on the bench had something to do with it!"

"Uh, actually, that was me," says Jenny, totally confused. She then has to listen to the new girl describe how horrible life's been as a homeless teen, and Jenny has to add, several more times, that that's her life, not the new girl's.

"Maybe we just had the same stuff happen?" asks the other girl. "It's a big city, and we're kinda little."

Jenny, upset by hearing someone else talk about the exact conditions of her life for the past several months, gets mad. Not mad at the other girl for her probably counterfeit biography, but mad at the situation she's been in.

"You know, I just wish that..." Jenny begins.
1111211122.title: Hey, that's my line!

choices: Jenny
The Naked Girl formerly known as 'Cop'
11112111221.content:
"Yeah!" says the other girl, who's equally outraged. As far as she's concerned, her past experience is genuine even if it does suspiciously mirror that of the girl claiming she's the original homeless waif between them. "I'd start by stomping downtown flat! That'd get some attention!"

The Thegen, triggered by Jenny's wish and shaped to a more literal turn by her unconscious desires, randomly picks one of the girls to act upon.

Which one?
11112111221.title: The big idea

choices: Jenny decides to hang around and see how this plays out
Jenny thinks it might be a good idea to get going...
111121112212.content:
It's been a weird day, so Jenny doesn't react with much surprise when her fellow ragamuffin begins reaching for the sky.

"What the heck's happening?!" the supposedly homeless girl asks, finding she's eight feet tall and getting bigger. She doesn't sound like she minds her absurd growth. By the look on her face, Jenny thinks she might be enjoying it more than is appropriate.

"Oooh, don't let anyone see you!" Jenny whispers, concerned that a naked girl is going to have even more trouble hiding her nakedness when she's 20 feet tall. Or taller. Jenny steps aside from the increasingly giant girl's feet, noticing the leopard-print spandex bike shorts and bandeau top that appear on the young giantess. That makes sense, since giantesses should have skimpy clothes, and leopard spots look good.

It's at this point that Jenny 'Gets It,' and cop-girl breaks the treeline. Still growing, too.

"What the hell?" someone asks from not very far away. A couple of other cops have arrived, looking around for something, and found out there's a giant girl growing out of the bushes.

Jenny, meanwhile, is considering things very rapidly. For a test, she wishes a top and some bike shorts up for herself, and is not completely amazed when they appear on her. She has wishing powers, somehow, but doesn't have time to consider it further as the cops are just outside the bushes she's hiding in.

"Hey, kid, get down here!" one of the cops calls up, sounding more puzzled than alarmed. Cop-girl carefully steps out of the scrub and kneels down with a smirk. Watching this operation is pretty amazing, since cop-girl's topped out at the height of a five-story building. Looks like she's stopped growing, too, fortunately.

"You can't arrest me just for being tall!" cop-girl scolds her fellow cops. Jenny is about to wish things back, but thinks twice. This could be amusing.

"Like hell I can't!" one of the cops says, chuckling along with the other one. "Just stay right there, or you'll get tased."

"Damn it what the hell happened Bobby?" The squirrel looks at Jenny and then scampers off and up the tree. Jenny looks over at the tree at her bike. Jenny slowly gets to her feet.A few small scrapes, and a rip above her kneecap on her pants is all that the whole ordeal has done to Jenny.
"Guess I got lucky there Bobby." Jenny says looking up while walking towards the tree.
"Huh, now it matches" Jenny boast while looking at the bent front rim. Jenny picks up the bike and moves it back and forth a few times.
"Seems OK" Jenny says while setting the chain back into the sprockets. Jenny finds the cable that has frayed and broke going to her breaks and shortens it so she has breaks again.
"OK, that will about to do it."Jenny starts to get on the bike when something catches her eye. The bike dug a small rut next to the tree. Inside of the rut Jenny notices something reflecting the sunlight.
Jenny gets off of her bike, letting it fall to the ground. Her fingers begin to tear at the soil around the object until Jenny holds it in her hands. Jenny places it in her palm and starts to clean it with her thumb. The world around her seems to stop, as Jenny fixcates on the luster and the image that makes it self more promoniate with each pass of her thumb.
What is reveled is a small circle of symbols Jenny flips the coin over to a side that has nothing. The side is completely blank.
"That's weird" Jenny thinks as she starts to examine the coin some more.
"errrrrrrrrrrrrrrrreep" Jenny's stomach interrupts reminding her of her current situation. Jenny stuffs the coin into her pocket and starts to head down the hill on her bike.
12121.title: Dramatic pause...

choices: Enough Sight Seeing
13.content:
The Empire had a new policy on loitering. They had installed cameras and had warned Jenny about rummaging. So the hotel was out.
The people at the park could be so mean. They looked down at Jenny and she knew it. Jenny did her best to keep herself and her clothes clean. But that did nothing to help the rips and wear in her clothing. And Jenny had been caught a few times while finding food.
But, the orchard had the best apples. Jenny knew that those apples were just a few hours away.
13.title: Go to the Orchard

choices: Jenny is able to turn
"Hello bushes."
131.content: With a small grunt Jenny started down the hill. Jenny felt the wind blow her hair back as the tires zipped down the hill. There was a small curve coming and Jenny pulls on the brake handle. Much to her surprise nothing. Nothing at all. The bike continued to pick up speed as the curve fast approached.
131.title: Enough Sight Seeing

choices: Truck!!!
Deer!
1311.content:
Jenny Braces her hands on the handle bars and grits her teeth. The bike continues barreling down the hill. The chain begins to slap against the frame from the back tire being bent. Jenny leans over as she starts into the turn. The back tire continues to wobble and it can be heard as it starts to skip into the air.
Determined Jenny pulls through the turn and begins to bring the bike upright. The bike is now soaring down the hill,the back end fish tailing. Jenny is doing all she can to control the bike when...
1311.title: Jenny is able to turn

13111.content:
"Truck!!" echoes through Jenny's head.
Her body freezes as the semi slams on it breaks. The sound of the air chambers and skidding rubber echoes through the street.
The truck with a gross weight of 28tons can by no means stop in time. The driver watches in horror as there is a loud thud when the bike hits the grill. Jenny is thrown from the bike before her arms go under the front steer tire crushing them instantly.
Jenny's body begins to tumble from the first set of tires before meeting the drive tires. Jenny's body is sucked under the set of 4 tires and dragged and ripped apart by the ABS as the driver continues to try to stop.
The remains are hit by the tandem tires out back along with the bike blowing out a tire.
50 feet later the truck comes to a stop. The traffic crawls past the truck a few minutes later. Adults and children complain wondering what is holding up there plans. The sight of the trail of what is left of Jenny is seen by many and quickly quiets the complaints. A year later the speed is dropped along the stretch of road.

The End
13111.title: Truck!!!

choices: Dramatic pause...
13112.content:
A deer standing in the middle of the road. Jenny jerks the wheel without thinking.
The bike flies over the gravel before the front tire strikes a ditch. Jenny goes flying into a small bush as the bike cartwheels into a tree.
13112.title: Deer!

choices: Continue to the Orchard
Go Somewhere else

131121.title: Something Shiny

choices: Pack the peaches and run
Let him see the coin.
1311211.content:
Jenny closed her eyes, taking a breath. When she opened them again words began to appear. She said them as she appeared, "Felicitas Fausta Perpetua." Then she moved her thumb and a dragon and phoenix appeared. Pondering the meaning of the coin she continued to the Orchard. The light was dimming so she had to go fast or be stuck in the cold. Jenny thought she wasn't already there and when she looked up to her surprise, there it appeared. She took the coin back out looked at it again, that's weird, she thought again. She rushed into the orchard, only this time she didn't get a chance pick anything. Instead, one of the pickers that had seen her without being noticed handed her a bag of peaches. He was a tall, observant Asian man. He saw the coin. He saw the coin in her hand.

"Little one, may I see your coin?"
1311211.title: Continue to the Orchard

choices: Run away like a bat ou of....
Stand there in wonder
13112112.content:
The old man inspected it carefully as the phrase on the coin changed to Chinese. "Young lady," he said, now inspecting her person quite seriously, " do you know what you have found in my bush?"

He could see she was nervous and smiled to try and calm it. She was still hungry and began to tear into the peach in her hand. The juice ran down her young face. "N-no," she replied, "I just saw it and thought it looked cool."

"More cool than you know," the old man half snickered, "It is a coin of perpetual luck. Did you rub it clean?"

"I think I did," she nervously replied taking another mouthful of peach. She saw him turn it over.

"Be careful," he warned, "after a while these coins will change their luck. Do not, do not wish on it too often." Then he opened her medium-sized child hand and placed it in the middle. "For now you are safe because your wish was safe. You asked for something you needed. Remember not to ask for wants too much. It does n ot like greediness. Good in return for good must be in your heart at all time."

Jenny just nodded not knowing quite what he was saying for sure.
13112112.title: Let him see the coin.

choices: Transform herself into a sinless peach tree in the orchard
Eat some more peaches and consider how best to combat the world's ills
131121122.content:
Jenny stood in awe of her good fortune, along with a sense of being weighed on an unseen scale of ethics. She had arrived at the orchard far sooner than she would have expected, and it wasn't unthinkable that the coin had helped. Now that the picker had passed her a bag of peaches, she felt it was only fitting to make a wish for his benefit.

At that moment, a bowl on a floating placemat appeared before the surprised picker. He took up the wide ceramic spoon and had a sip, responding favorably over the bowl's contents.

"Bazhen danhua tang," he said, nodding with eyes closed as he savored the broth. "Eight treasure egg drop soup. I thank you for your generosity, young lady. Continue to address the nobler side of your nature, and the coin will not lead you to grief."

The two shared a companionable silence as they ate, and then the picker put down his spoon and went back to work with another nod of his head. Spoon, bowl, and placemat floated straight up and out of sight, perhaps to heaven.

"Thank you for the peaches and the info on the coin," said Jenny, shuffling from foot to foot as she tried to come up with ways to manifest her goodness.

"Remember," said the picker, shuffling peaches into his burlap sack, "too many wishes, and the coin's luck will change. And even sooner, if your motives are impure."

Jenny decides to...

info.brief_description: Jenny is a homeless 13 year old girl who one day finds a magic token.
info.description:
Jenny is a homeless 13 year old girl who one day finds a Thegen(ancient token). Thegen is a magic token that has the power to grant unlimited wishes.


THIS IS MEANT TO BE 18+ ADULT STORY. IF UNDER THAT AGE PLEASE STOP READING.
I will limit the fetishes just a bit.

I will allow:
--Real life actions, ie death, violence, rape, abuse, blood, injury, etc.
--You can add more characters perhaps even put yourself into the story all that I ask is that you be descriptive in the intro of the character.
--Shrinking/Growing. But keep it between 1" and 50'.
--I will allow for age progression and regression. Any age.
--I will allow for transformation of people, animals, and things. Into anything you can think of.
--Furies and half breeds(yes you can mix things with traits that you choose just build up to it.)
--Character Vore,(in the mouth,in the throat, up the bum, in the snatch, in the tail, cock and anything else you can think of). But if the character hits the stomach kill off that character(no anti-acid deals).
--Bad grammar etc. As long as the what you are saying is clear.

I will NOT allow
--Chapters with less then 3 sentences. That is not asking much. I won't cut them. I will just extend the description if need be. This is the only reason I see for editing chapters.

Have fun.
